attributes.action: Make it mandatory for all MP's and MEP's to produce verifiable receipts for all expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone claiming expenses from employers has to produce receipts to obtain re-imbursement. MP.s and MEP's should have the same responsibility and should not be able to claim anything that they cannot produce proof of legitimate expenditure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
